Never mind, got it to work :)
^ what did you do? I have the same problem and can't get it working.
ah oh well, I didn't correctly disable tropico 4 in the firewall.

once u input the serial key, you dont need to register for an account, just exit when it asks for login and password and start the game again with tropico4.exe, make sure to block the .exe from accessing internet

Blocked the exe in windows firewall but it still kept getting through some how, so found out you can add this to your "Hosts" file if anyone else has problems.
127.0.0.1 launcher01.kalypsomedia.com
worked for me
Yep, md.ford. Adding that to the host file worked perfectly! Thank you!

After installing, BEFORE RUNNING FOR THE FIRST TIME, It's very important to block tropico4.exe in your windows firewallby by making a new rule to block outbound. google how.

Dudes,

I figured out how to make tropico 4 works without disconnecting the ethernet cable.

Just block ON ANTIVIRUS the url launcher01.kalypsomedia.com and then use the serial provided by heromaster. Block on firewall too as other people already said. In the first time, it'll ask for the serial, but after one time, it'll never opens the launcher again.

Worked with me with the Airlines Tycoon 2 and Tropico 4 Modern Times.

Hope it works for you

Cya
I have the FLT version.. how do i put this into it?

@Riael_Krane 

Seems this includes the 1.05 update thankfully!

One should block tropico4.exe from accessing the internet, following this guide: http://technet.microsoft.com/en-us/library/cc947786%28v=ws.10%29.aspx
The guide you posted is the wrong guide, it is meant for blocking a certain TCP or UDP port. For blocking a specific application only, it is much easier to use the guide I link to above.

Key: T4MT-R3ZX4-H9FEB-PA2XU-2E285-E8KK7

IT WORKS FINE, only have to follow the instructions signed above by those guys, and don't be retard stupid suckers, please... Didn't work for me first time, but afterwards i did as stated and... great!
